name: Slimdude
description:
A short and simple Slenderman horror game with PSX inspired graphics.


Controls:

W A S D  -> Walk around

Left Click -> Interact

ESC -> Closes the game

Assets used for this game:
  • Paper Crumble SFX By Nicole Marie T
  • Fonts and Particle Pack By Kenney
  • Horror SFX Pack By Rubert_Spore
  • Chaos music album By Sami Hiltunen
  • Free Audio Asset Collection By Sami Hiltunen
  • Impact Sound Pack by Kenney
  • Created using assets from ambientCG.com (CC0)

A lot of these assets were either modified or mixed together.
